articles.title: LaLiga chief Tebas apologises, says Vinicius tweet 'not understood' - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: LaLiga president Javier Tebas apologised for a tweet he said was misinterpreted about Vinícius Júnior and said that it is up to the Spanish federation to combat racism in the stadiums because the league does not have that authority.
articles.content: LaLiga president Javier Tebas on Wednesday apologised for a tweet about Vinícius Júnior he said was misinterpreted, and said that the Spanish federation (RFEF) ought to be doing more to combat racism… [+3027 chars]
